AM Routine: Cleanser, Ice, Toner, Serum (every other day), Hydrator (optional), Moisturizer, Sunscreen
PM Routine: Cleanser, Ice, Timed Acne Med, Cleanser, Toner, Hydrator (optional), Moisturizer
Notes: Timed Acne Med schedule: Week 1 = 15 min then rinse; Week 2 = 30 min then rinse; Week 3 = 60 min then rinse; Week 4+ = leave on overnight if tolerated.

AM Routine: Cleanser, Ice, Toner, Serum, Hydrator (optional), Moisturizer, Sunscreen
PM Routine: Cleanser, Ice, Toner, Hydrator (optional), Acne Med
Notes: No moisturizer before or after acne med
